abilities.name: Damage Bind
abilities.effect: Each Pokémon that has any damage counters on it (both yours and your opponent's) can't use any Poké-Powers.

attacks.name: Gigavolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Reflect Energy
attacks.effect: Move an Energy card attached to Ampharos to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Dig Well
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck, choose as many Water Energy cards as you like, and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Discard the other cards. This power can't be used if Blastoise is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Aqua Press
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to all Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Double Launcher
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Water Energy attached to Blastoise. Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Blastoise can't use Double Launcher during your next turn.

abilities.name: Fire Breath
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Burned. This power can't be used if Blaziken is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy attached to Blaziken.

abilities.name: Power Circulation
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for up to 2 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them on top of your deck in any order. If you do, put 2 damage counters on Delcatty. This power can't be used if Delcatty is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Power Heal
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Delcatty. Then, remove 2 damage counters from Delcatty.

abilities.name: Reverse Time
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Dialga from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your discard pile for up to 3 in any combination of Pokémon (excluding Pokémon LV.X) and basic Energy cards. Show them to your opponent and put them on top of your deck in any order.

attacks.name: Time-Space Traveling
attacks.effect: Draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

abilities.name: Time Aura
abilities.effect: As long as Dialga is your Active Pokémon, your opponent can't play any Pokémon from his or her hand to evolve his or her Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Metal Burn
attacks.effect: Discard all Metal Energy attached to Dialga.

attacks.name: Deafen
attacks.effect: Your opponent can't play any Trainer cards or Stadium cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Second Strike
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has 2 or more damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Psychic Connect
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Psychic Energy attached to 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Gardevoir is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Energy Burst
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Gardevoir and the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic Protection
attacks.effect: Gardevoir has no Weakness during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Let Loose
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Giratina from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws up to 4 cards. (You draw your cards first.)

attacks.name: Earth Power
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Over Slash
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dark Wing Flaps
attacks.effect: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

abilities.name: Electric Barrier
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Pokémon (excluding any Manectric) by attacks.

attacks.name: Power Wave
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each Pokémon that has any Poké-Powers (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Attract Current
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Splashing Turn
attacks.effect: You may switch Palkia with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pearl Breath
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Iron Skull
abilities.effect: Rampardos's attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Head Smash
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon would be Knocked Out by this attack, Rampardos does 40 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Mold Breaker
attacks.effect: Any damage done to Rampardos by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance) until the end of your next turn.

attacks.name: Flower Aroma
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from Shaymin. The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Damage Aid
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 30 damage plus 50 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Growth
attacks.effect: Attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to Shaymin.

attacks.name: Air Slash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to Shaymin.

abilities.name: Lazy Paunch
abilities.effect: If Slaking used any attacks during your last turn, Slaking can't attack.

attacks.name: Best Dash
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Slaking by attacks is increased by 50 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Pokémon SP and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Team Attack
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Pokémon SP you have in play.

attacks.name: Midnight Eyes
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Perish Song
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Asleep and was damaged or affected by Midnight Eyes during your last turn, the Defending Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Healing Song
attacks.effect: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon.

abilities.name: Temper Tantrum
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard as many cards as you like from your hand. If you do, put that many damage counters on Banette. This power can't be used if Banette is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Darkness Switch
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy card attached to Banette, and then switch all damage counters on Banette with those on the Defending Pokémon. (If an effect of this attack is prevented, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.name: Loneliness
attacks.effect: You may show your hand to your opponent. If you do and if you don't have any Pokémon in your hand, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Metal Trait
abilities.effect: As long as Bastiodon has a Pokémon Tool attached to it, remove 1 damage counter from Bastiodon between turns.

attacks.name: Iron Defense
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Bastiodon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Iron Tackle
attacks.effect: Bastiodon does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Colorful Powder
attacks.effect: If Beautifly has 2 or less Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If Beautifly has 3 Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Poisoned. If Beautifly has 4 or more Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep, Burned, and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Silver Scale
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has any Resistance, this attack's base damage is 60 instead of 30.

abilities.name: Nurse Call
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Nurse Call Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Blissey is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Return
attacks.effect: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Double-edge
attacks.effect: Blissey does 60 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Energy Stream
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to Dialga.

attacks.name: Diamond Blow
attacks.effect: Dialga can't attack during your next turn.

abilities.name: Sinkhole
abilities.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon retreats, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Push Down
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Magnitude
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Camouflage Pattern
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Dustox by your opponent's Pokémon that is affected by 2 or more Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Smogscreen
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Chemical Scale
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.effect: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Jet Smash
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 70 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Empoleon can't use Jet Smash during your next turn.

attacks.name: Strafe
attacks.effect: You may switch Giratina with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Broken-space Blow
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Knocked Out by this attack, put the Defending Pokémon and all cards attached to it in the Lost Zone instead of discarding them.

attacks.name: Dragonbreath
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Swim
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Water Energy attached to any of his or her Pokémon, you may do 30 damage to any 1 Benched Pokémon instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Water Slide
attacks.effect: You may move all Energy cards attached to Golduck to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Wriggle
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each of your opponent's Pokémon. If that coin flip is heads, this attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dwindling Wave
attacks.effect: Does 100 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Gyarados .

attacks.name: Rushing Flames
attacks.effect: Discard as many Fire Energy as you like attached to your Pokémon in play. Flip a coin for each Energy card you discarded. This attack does 80 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Infernape.

attacks.name: Revenge Melody
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage times the number of Kricketot and Kricketune in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Bug Buzz
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Asleep, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage. Remove the Special Condition Asleep from the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Harrumph
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Before doing damage, discard all Trainer cards attached to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Body Press
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Cheerful Voice
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. If you do, your turn ends. During your next turn, each of Ludicolo's attacks does 60 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Mad Dance
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Best Dance
attacks.effect: After doing damage, remove from Ludicolo the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon. Ludicolo can't use Best Dance during your next turn.

attacks.name: Love Call
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. Search your deck for a Pokémon that is the same type as the Pokémon you chose, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Sweet Kiss
attacks.effect: Your opponent may draw a card.

attacks.name: Flame Bash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. Search your deck for a number of Fire Energy cards up to the number of heads and attach them to any of your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Mysterious Flames
attacks.effect: If you have more Energy in play than your opponent, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Tsunami
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Energy Blow
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Shaymin.

attacks.name: Aromatherapy
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Green Blast
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Grass Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Soothing Scent
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, excluding damage, done to Toxicroak .

attacks.name: Deep Poison
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 20 damage plus 40 more damage.

abilities.name: Galactic Switch
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move an Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon SP to another of your Pokémon. Then, put 2 damage counters on Bronzong . This power can't be used if Bronzong is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psychic Pulse
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Spike Wound
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 50 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Poison Experiment
attacks.effect: You may discard a Grass or Darkness Energy attached to Cacturne. If you discard a Grass Energy, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If you discard a Darkness Energy, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Stretch Vine
attacks.effect: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.effect: Remove 2 damage counters from Carnivine.

attacks.name: Vine Extract
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Ascension
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Cascoon and put it onto Cascoon. (This counts as evolving Cascoon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Poison Thread
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Firebreathing
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Rock Smash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Knock Over
attacks.effect: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

abilities.name: Flash Bite
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Crobat from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Toxic Fang
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokémon between turns.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Tail Code
attacks.effect: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.effect: Remove 1 damage counter from Grotle.

attacks.name: Black Cry
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat or use any Poké-Powers during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Dark Slash
attacks.effect: You may discard a Darkness Energy attached to Houndoom . If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Teleportation Burst
attacks.effect: You may switch Kirlia with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Interrupt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Aura Sphere
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Do the Wave
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Cold Feet
abilities.effect: If Mightyena is affected by a Special Condition, ignore all Energy necessary to use Mightyena's attacks.

attacks.name: Collude
attacks.effect: If you played any Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Desperate Attack
attacks.effect: If Mightyena has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokémon, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Upper Hand
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. That Pokémon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Psybeam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Fire Tail Slap
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Monferno.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Sludge Cell
abilities.effect: If Muk remains affected by any Special Conditions between turns, remove 2 damage counters from Muk.

attacks.name: Strange Poison
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. If tails, Muk is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Strange Sludge
attacks.effect: If Muk is Poisoned, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Water Vein
attacks.effect: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Flip a coin for each Energy card you find there. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads. Shuffle the revealed cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Octazooka
attacks.effect: Any time the Defending Pokémon tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, the attack does nothing. (If the Defending Pokémon is no longer your opponent's Active Pokémon, this effect ends.)

attacks.name: Bubblebeam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Stealth Rock
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Shed Skin
attacks.effect: Remove 4 damage counters from Seviper.

attacks.name: Bite and Escape
attacks.effect: You may switch Seviper with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Paralyze Poison
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Endure
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, if Shieldon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, Shieldon is not Knocked Out and its remaining HP becomes 10 instead.

attacks.name: Rock Slide
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.effect: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Silcoon and put it onto Silcoon. (This counts as evolving Silcoon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge

attacks.name: Fight Back
attacks.effect: If Vigoroth has any damage counters on it, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Double Slap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Rocket Tackle
attacks.effect: Wartortle does 10 damage to itself. Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Wartortle by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.effect: Zangoose can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Invite and Strike
attacks.effect: Switch the Defending Pokémon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Chop Up
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Sneaky Attack
attacks.effect: If Cacnea has any Darkness Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Shoot Needle
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and this attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can choose the same Pokémon more than once, but you can't do more than 10 damage to that Pokémon in this way.)

attacks.name: Poison Breath
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Sweet Saliva
attacks.effect: Remove 1 damage counter from each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, remove 3 damage counters from Chansey. If tails, remove 3 damage counters from the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Pulled Punch
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack's base damage is 10 instead of 40.

attacks.effect: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Shoot Through
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dig Under
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.effect: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thunder Fang
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Target Attack
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. If that Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Lapras.

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Stretch Tongue
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.effect: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Energy Ball
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Lotad but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Grass Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.effect: Skitty does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Poison Structure
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have a Stadium card in play, you may use this power. Each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) (excluding Pokémon SP) is now Poisoned. This power can't be used if Skuntank is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Slakoth.

attacks.name: Slack Off
attacks.effect: Remove all damage counters from Slakoth. Slakoth can't attack during your next turn.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Run Around
attacks.effect: You may switch Swablu with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Show Off
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Tauros does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Focus Energy
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Torchic's Fire Shard attack's base damage is 80.

attacks.name: Fire Shard
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Flame Ball
attacks.effect: Move an Energy card attached to Torkoal to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Reheat
attacks.effect: Discard up to 2 Energy cards from your hand. For each card you discarded, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

cards.name: Team Galactic's Invention G-101 Energy Gain
Team Galactic's Invention G-103 Power Spray
Team Galactic's Invention G-105 Poké Turn

abilities.name: Time Crystal
abilities.effect: Each Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) (excluding Pokémon SP) can't use any Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Remove Lost
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, remove an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon and put it in the Lost Zone.

abilities.name: Tri-Poison
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 3 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns. This power can't be used if Drapion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Sniping Tail
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

abilities.name: Invisible Tentacles
abilities.effect: Whenever your opponent's Pokémon tries to attack, your opponent discards 1 card from his or her hand. (If your opponent can't discard 1 card, your opponent's Pokémon can't attack.) You can't use more than 1 Invisible Tentacles Poké-Body each turn.

attacks.name: Darkness Lost
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) If any of your opponent's Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from this attack, put that Pokémon and all cards attached to it in the Lost Zone instead of discarding it.

abilities.name: Lost Cyclone
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Any player who has 4 or more Benched Pokémon chooses 3 of his or her Benched Pokémon. Put the other Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to them in the Lost Zone. (You choose your Pokémon first.) This power can't be used if Palkia is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hydro Shot
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy attached to Palkia . Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Thankfulness
abilities.effect: Each of your Grass Pokémon (excluding any Shaymin) gets +40 HP. You can't use more than 1 Thankfulness Poké-Body each turn.

attacks.name: Seed Flare
attacks.effect: Choose as many Grass Energy cards from your hand as you like and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. If you do, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each Grass Energy attached in this way.

abilities.name: Revenge Seed
abilities.effect: If any of your Grass Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack during his or her last turn, each of Shaymin's attacks does 60 more damage to the Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Energy Flare
attacks.effect: You may move any number of Energy cards attached to your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunderpunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage. If tails, Electabuzz does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Swords Dance
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Scyther's Slash attack's base damage is 60.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.effect: If Lotad has any Water Energy attached to it, Lotad's Retreat Cost is 0.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.effect: Remove 1 damage counter from Lotad.

attacks.name: Jump On
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Roost
attacks.effect: Remove 4 damage counters from Swablu. Swablu can't retreat during your next turn.

attacks.name: Mirror Move
attacks.effect: If Swablu was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does the same amount of damage done to Swablu to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Find Wildfire
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Brushfire
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Grass Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Inflame
attacks.effect: Discard a Fire Energy card from your hand. (If you can't discard a card from your hand, this attack does nothing.)
